description.en:
1. Selfish Sweets / Wagamama Sweets (ワガママすいーつ)
Mari snuck into Hiro's apartment yet again to welcome him home from work. Hiro forgot it was her birthday, and now she is going to make him pay dearly!
2. Koyoi Revolution (こよいレボリューション)
Ever since she was flashed as a middle-schooler, Koyoi has had a fear of all men. Strangely, her tutor Naoto doesn't elicit this reaction.
3. Mahiru Full Speed (まひるフルスピード)
Finding out that her favorite senpai uses her as a masturbatory aid, Mahiru decides she'll help him out directly as repayment for him helping her pass an exam.
4. Akeno Portrait (明乃ポートレート)
After getting caught at school with a dirty book, Yukihiro is reprimanded by his cousin/teacher Akeno. Soon after, as part of a deal, Akeno has to be Yukihiro's replacement for the confiscated book.
5. Yue Negative (夕映ネガティブ)
After finding out that her childhood friend/crush Junichi was being confessed to by a classmate, Yue takes drastic measures and steals his virginity before her rival can.
6. Begging Girlfriend / Onedari Kanojo (おネダリ彼女)
Akira put her boyfriend on an intimacy ban until he brought his grades up, who would've guessed that this break would be harder on her than him.
7. Don’t Call Me Cute / Kawaii Nante Iwanaide (カワイイなんて言わないで)
After calling her diminutive boyfriend "cute", Megumi decides to put on a maid uniform to see if she can make it up to him.
8. Late Inclinations / Imasara na Seiheki (今更なセイヘキ)
Noticing her boyfriend's fascination with tennis-wear, Shizuka confronts him and discovers that it's rather an instance of "reverse causation" in Takuma's case.
9. My Midori-san / Ore no Midori-san (俺のミドリさん )
Midori decides to give Yamakura a special oily-massage service as recompense for earlier turning down a beach date.
10. Sensei Won't Stop / Sensei ga Tomaranai (センセイが止まらない)
Yukari-sensei invites Chihiro over to her house and he finally shows some initiative in bed (at least for a few minutes until Sensei breaks free).

*This book contain returning characters from Dr. P's previous book, Shinryakuteki Renai Shugi
